Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    Application
    This class accepts command line arguments and gives evolutions for ElementaryCAs and TotalisticCAs.
    Automaton
    The class Automaton inherits from Rule and Generation, and creates either totalistic or elementary rules.
    CellularAutomaton
    This is used to determine whether a String represents an ElementaryCellularAutomaton or TotalisticCellularAutomaton.
    CellularAutomatonNotFoundException
    Exception that is thrown if Cellular Automaton is unknown, meaning it is neither ECA nor TCA.
    ElementaryAutomaton
    Extending from Automaton, this class creates a elementary automaton, creates a rule with elementary rule.
    ElementaryRule
    Elementary Rule creates a rule that evolves based on the arrangement of it's neighborhood states.
    Generation
    The Generation class represents a row of cells in a 2-State Cellular Automaton.
    Rule
    The Rule class will be used to generate either a totalistic or elementary rule, using the given ruleNum.
    RuleNumException
    This class will check if the given integer is outside valid range.
    TotalisticAutomaton
    This class extends from Automaton and will create a Totalistic Automaton, which has a rule that evolves based on the sums of its neighborhood.
    TotalisticRule
    THis class creates a Totalistic Rule, which evolves depending on the sum of the states of cells next to it, instead of the arrangement.
